DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate functional effect arthroscopic iliopsoas release . To complete aim , recruit patient undergone arthroscopic iliopsoas release Dr. Aoki . Each subject contralateral nonoperative hip serve control . To delineate effect arthroscopic surgery alone result iliopsoas release addition arthroscopic surgery , recruit second control group consist patient undergone arthroscopic surgery Dr. Aoki without iliopsoas release . For hip subject , : - Quantify muscle volume iliopsoas muscle MRI . - Quantify hip flexion strength isokinetic dynamometry . - Quantify patient function satisfaction functional outcome survey . This data allow u test follow hypothesis : - Compared non-operative hip , hip undergo arthroscopic iliopsoas release decrease iliopsoas muscle volume hip flexion strength . - Compared hip undergo arthroscopic surgery without iliopsoas release , hip undergo arthroscopic iliopsoas release decrease iliopsoas muscle volume hip flexion strength . - Patient function satisfaction positively correlate muscle bulk strength .
